Articles.Content:
Hello, every time I try yo quick-save by pressing F5 my options to screen comes up, and if I press F9 my volume goes down even if i have already selected the option do Enable Fullscreen.

Does anyone know how to change this?

Thank you
I think I can help you here, try reassigning the hotkeys for those actions in the Settings menu at the main screen.
You're probably on a laptop. You may need to hold the Fn key to actually get access to the F1-F12 keys instead of whatever useless crap the laptop maker has permanently bound to them.
